multiQuestions.question: What are some properties of an instance type?
multiQuestions.answer: vCPUs, Memory, Instance Storage, Network Performance

multiQuestions.question: What is a Family Type?
multiQuestions.answer: Instance Types with simlar settings are grouped into Family Types to help find the right settings for your needs

multiQuestions.question: Name the different Family Types
multiQuestions.answer: Micro Instances, General Purpose, Compute Optimized, GPU Instances, FPGA Instances, Memory Optimized, Storage Optimized

multiQuestions.question: What are some Instance Purchasing Options?
multiQuestions.answer: On-Demand Instances, Reserved Instances, Scheduled Instances, Spot Instances, On-Demand Capacity Reservations

multiQuestions.question: What is a security group?
multiQuestions.answer: An instance level firewall allowing you to restrict Ingress and Egress traffic by specifying what traffic is allowed to communicate with that instance

multiQuestions.question: What are some options of a Security Group to restrict inbound and outbound communication to an EC2 instance?

booleanQuestions.question: If an EC2 instance is stopped, ephemoral storage is lost
If an EC2 instance is rebooted, ephemoral storage is lost
